![](http://i.imgur.com/PPHh9lU.png)

# ipinfo_io
I couldn't seem to locate any APIs for https://ipinfo.io/. Not ones that supported anything more than geoip, at least. This API was created with the intent to wrap all of ipinfo's website's functionality into a python module. That includes:
- Grabbing a specific IP address's **ASN**.
- Grabbing **every IP** owned by a specific ASN.
- Displaying the connected client's **IP & geo information**.
- Grabbing an **ASN's** information (whois, ipblocks, etc)
- Grabbing information on a specific **IP address**.


I also decided to write a user-interface, for my own testing purposes. But everyone else is more than welcome to use it.

# Dependencies
- python requests module (pip install requests)
- python beautifulsoup module (pip install beautifulsoup4)

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/zeropwn/ipinfo_io
cd ipinfo_io
chmod +x ipinfo_io.py
./ipinfo_io.py
```

# Usage

### Displaying the connected client's IP & geo information.
```python
>>> import ipinfo_io
>>> ipinfo = ipinfo_io()
>>> print(ipinfo.get_my_ip())
{
  "ip": "198.252.153.102",
  "hostname": "moa.riseup.net",
  "city": "Seattle",
  "region": "Washington",
  "country": "US",
  "loc": "47.6062,-122.3321",
  "org": "AS16652 Riseup Networks",
  "postal": "98194"
}
```

### Grabbing a specific IP address's ASN
```python
>>> import ipinfo_io
>>> ipinfo = ipinfo_io()
>>> print(ipinfo.get_asn_of_ip('198.252.153.102'))

"AS16652"
```

### Grabbing an ASN's information
```python
>>> import ipinfo_io
>>> ipinfo = ipinfo_io()
>>> print(ipinfo.get_asn('AS16652'))
{"ipblocks": ["198.252.153.0/24", "199.254.238.0/24", "2620:13:4000::/48"], "whois": {"Source": "ARIN", "ASName": "RISEUP", "ASNumber": "16652", "OrgID": "DEW", "OrgName": "RiseupNetworks", "OrgNOCHandle": "NOC12615-ARIN", "ASHandle": "AS16652", "PostalCode": "98194", "OrgTechHandle": "NOC12615-ARIN", "OrgAdminHandle": "NOC12615-ARIN", "State/Prov": "WA", "City": "Seattle", "Comment": "http", "OrgAbuseHandle": "NOC12615-ARIN", "RegDate": "1993-11-23", "Updated": "2012-05-19", "CanAllocate": "", "Country": "US", "Street": "POBox4282"}, "summary": {"registry": "arin", "asn": "AS16652", "ips": "769", "allocated": "2011-05-19", "domain": "riseup.net"}}
```

### Grabbing a specific IP's information
```python
>>> import ipinfo_io
>>> ipinfo = ipinfo_io()
>>> print(ipinfo.get_ip('199.254.238.213'))
{
  "ip": "199.254.238.213",
  "hostname": "seattle213.riseup.net",
  "city": "Seattle",
  "region": "Washington",
  "country": "US",
  "loc": "47.6062,-122.3321",
  "org": "AS16652 Riseup Networks",
  "postal": "98194"
}
```
